parameters.description: Hill coefficient for coral cover threshold in COTS recruitment (unitless, >=1)
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Controls sharpness of coral cover threshold for COTS recruitment; higher values produce more abrupt outbreak/collapse transitions
parameters.ecological_justification: Outbreaks of COTS are triggered when coral cover exceeds a critical threshold, with recruitment highly sensitive to coral availability. A Hill function allows for a sharp, nonlinear response, better capturing observed boom-bust dynamics.
